entity.name: SupplyChainConfig

boolean.name: autoAllocateOnAllocation
boolean.title: Auto allocate stock on other stock moves
boolean.help: If true, after allocating quantity for a given stock move we allocate the remaining quantity in others stock moves.

boolean.name: autoRequestReservedQty
boolean.title: Auto request reserved qty
boolean.help: If true, the requested quantity for reservation will be equal to the quantity of the given sale order line.

boolean.name: autoAllocateOnAvailabilityRequest
boolean.title: Auto allocate during an availability request

integer.name: saleOrderReservationDateSelect
integer.title: Sale order date used for stock reservation

integer.name: defaultEstimatedDate
integer.title: Default estimated date in stock move from sale order

integer.name: defaultEstimatedDateForPurchaseOrder
integer.title: Default estimated date in stock move from purchase order

boolean.name: activateIncStockMovePartialInvoicing
boolean.title: Activate partial invoicing for incoming moves

boolean.name: activateOutStockMovePartialInvoicing
boolean.title: Activate partial invoicing for outgoing moves
